Package piazzapanictests.tests

Class HobStationTests

  • java.lang.Object
    • piazzapanictests.tests.MasterTestClass
      • piazzapanictests.tests.HobStationTests
  • public class HobStationTests
extends MasterTestClass
    Tests for the frying stations. Hobs only interact with raw patties and cooked patties so no other items need to be used or checked.
    Author:
    Hubert Solecki, Jack Vickers

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class piazzapanictests.tests.MasterTestClass

        assemble, assemblyStation, chef, Chop, chopStation, crate, CustCount, customerController, customerCounter, FC, Fry, hobStation, manager, masterChef, Oven, ovenStation, params, pathfinding, textureDictionary, Toast, toasterStation, trashCan, vals, world

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      HobStationTests()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void testBurnItemOnHob()
      Tests that the hob station can burn a burger if maximum progress for both cooking and interaction is reached.
      void testCannotUseWhileLocked()
      Tests that the hob station cannot be used when it is locked.
      void testCanUseWhenUnlocked()
      Tests that the hob station can be used when it is unlocked.
      void testGiveItemWhenHobFull()
      Tests whether an item can be placed on the hob when there is already an item on it; should return false.
      void testIncorrectItemOnHob()
      Tests that incorrect items cannot be fried as current recipe on toaster station is null when placed on the toaster.
      void testItemRetrievedDuringFryingAndProgress()
      Tests that an item can be picked up during frying and that the progress of the item being cooked is saved in its progress attribute.
      void testRemoveItemFromFryer()
      Tests that an item can be removed from the frying station whether frying is complete or not.
      void testRemoveItemWhenHobEmpty()
      Tests whether an item can be removed from the hob when it has nothing on it; should not allow
      void testUpdateMethodHobStation()
      Tests that the update function updates the hob station and sets interaction to false.

      • Methods inherited from class piazzapanictests.tests.MasterTestClass

        EndGame, instantiateCustomerScripts, instantiateCustomerScripts, instantiateMasterChef, instantiateWorld, instantiateWorldAndAssemblyStation, instantiateWorldAndChefs, instantiateWorldAndChoppingStation, instantiateWorldAndCustomerCounter, instantiateWorldAndFoodCrate, instantiateWorldAndHobsStation, instantiateWorldAndOvenStation, instantiateWorldAndToasterStation, instantiateWorldAndTrashCan, SetUpPathfinding

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • testGiveItemWhenHobFull

        public void testGiveItemWhenHobFull()
        Tests whether an item can be placed on the hob when there is already an item on it; should return false. Placing a different item on the hob should not change what is currently on the hob.

      • testItemRetrievedDuringFryingAndProgress

        public void testItemRetrievedDuringFryingAndProgress()
        Tests that an item can be picked up during frying and that the progress of the item being cooked is saved in its progress attribute.

      • testUpdateMethodHobStation

        public void testUpdateMethodHobStation()
        Tests that the update function updates the hob station and sets interaction to false.

        public void testCannotUseWhileLocked()
        Tests that the hob station cannot be used when it is locked.

      • testCanUseWhenUnlocked

        public void testCanUseWhenUnlocked()
        Tests that the hob station can be used when it is unlocked.
